column3: Please fix all typos in one commit. No need to open several pull request.\n
ACK and agree with @MarcoFalke: please combine multiple comment changes in one PR.\n
Posthumous ACK, but yes better to combine these into one PR\n

@wbinns I hope it is ok for you that I leave this pull closed. If you find more spelling errors, feel free to open a new pull with the new ones (including the one from this pull).

In any case, I was planning to fix several trivial issues in a pull later this week when I find time. I will make sure to include your patch as well.
